solution_line_template: Five bags of chips cost ${payment_per_friend} x {num_friends} = $<<{payment_per_friend}*{num_friends}={total_cost_of_chips}>>{total_cost_of_chips}.
So each bag of chips costs ${total_cost_of_chips}/{num_bags} = $<<{total_cost_of_chips}/{num_bags}={cost_per_bag}>>{cost_per_bag}.
